articles.title: Anthropic, Databricks Team Up in Scramble for AI Revenue
articles.author: Wall Street Journal
articles.summary: Anthropic and Databricks struck a five-year, $100 million deal to sell artificial intelligence tools to businesses. They are targeting those who want to build their own AI agents and want to sell them to businesses for $100m.

articles.title: 86% of software development teams in UAE will use AI agents within two years
articles.author: Khaleejtimes
articles.summary: AI agents are set to revolutionise software development processes in the UAE. 100% of teams use or expect to use AI code for generation, according to Salesforce's new State of IT survey of software development leaders. UAE leaders expect their teams will increasingly focus on AI.

articles.title: Chinese Scientists Develop Human-Like Robotic Hand With Smart Palm-Finger Coordination
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: Imagine a robotic hand that coordinates its palm and fingers with human-like precision and can grasp objects with perfect stability and also "feeling" like a human hand.    i.e. imagine a robot hand that can feel like a person.

articles.title: Gemini 2.5 is now available for Advanced users and it seriously improves Google's AI reasoning
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Gemini 2.5 is the best AI reasoning model we've seen yet. Google has just announced it and it's the best in terms of AI reasoning. It's available on Google Play Store now. It costs $99.99 for a GBP.

articles.title: AI-driven teaching methods essential for modern education, researcher says
articles.author: Phys Dot Org
articles.summary: AI is transforming education by reshaping lesson planning, grading and student engagement. It enables students to improve their education through learning and interaction with the world around them. It's changing the way education is organised and taught. It is changing students' lives as well.

articles.title: Revolutionizing Education: Brisk AI Secures $15M Funding for AI Teaching Tools
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is coming into our classrooms. Teachers will be empowered with cutting-edge tools to personalize learning and identify AI-generated student work, and streamline administrative tasks in the future, as well as in today's classrooms.

articles.title: AI's impact on jobs, tech's touchy topic
articles.author: LLUIS GENE
articles.summary: "Stop Hiring Humans" read a sign at an AI conference in Las Vegas. The impact of new artificial intelligence models on the world of work had sparked some unease. "We're not worried about tiptoeing around. We're sparking the conversation," said Fahad Alam of Artisan.

articles.title: Google's AI-Generated Search Feature Hasn't Yet Changed How Users Interact With Search Results
articles.author: Staff Report
articles.summary: Google announced the launch of AI Overviews, its generative artificial intelligence-fuelled search feature, in May 2024. It offers Google users AI-generated answers by sourcing and summarizing information from different websites. It was initially named Search Generative Experience.
